22:12 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Online?  
22:13 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
22:13 <@sdumitriu> Hi mflorea  
22:14 <+mflorea> Hi sdumitriu  
22:14 <@sdumitriu> Will you have time to release tomorrow?  
22:14 <+mflorea> yes  
22:14 <@sdumitriu> OK  
22:14 <@sdumitriu> I'll try to check the failing test today

22:51 <+sburjan`> sdumitriu: around ?

22:53 <+sburjan`> regarding XE-1080  
22:53 <+sburjan`> isn't that a component of the AS application ?  
22:54 <@sdumitriu> Nope, not yet  
22:54 <@sdumitriu> It's still in the XE documents  
22:54 <+sburjan`> seemed odd to see this kind of code in XE  
22:54 <@sdumitriu> It is  
22:54 <@sdumitriu> But Vincent proposed to do some cleanup
